text: Pogonocherus parvulus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by John Lawrence LeConte in 1852. It is known from Canada and the United States.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus parvulus. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1852
title: Pogonocherus parvulus
